nodes.text: This shuttle was used by the Neimoidian trade officer Gode Takrab. It was similar in shape to a big, dusty yellow insect.

During the Second Battle of Theed of 32 BBY, Takrab was ordered to fly to the Droid Control Ship in his shuttle, along with his droid TC-11, for an important mission. Two security B1-Series battle droids were assigned to protect the shuttle.

Nute Gunray then assigned an additional squad, commanded by RK-7, to protect the shuttle, because Takrab's mission was very important. Besides, should Takrab be killed in the battle, Gunray intended to use the shuttle as an escape way.
